text: Silver iodate is a chemical compound. Its chemical formula is AgIO3. It has silver and iodate ions in it. The silver is in the +1 oxidation state. == Properties == Silver iodate is a colorless solid. It does not dissolve in water. It is an oxidizing agent. == Preparation == It is made by reacting silver nitrate with sodium iodate. == Related pages == *Potassium iodate *Sodium periodate *Sodium bromate Category:Silver compounds Category:Iodine compounds
title: Silver iodate
